response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product embodies innovation, quality, and functionality, making it an unparalleled choice for those seeking the best in their field. Given its exceptional value and unique features, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering all these aspects, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for this product at $15,000. I am confident that you will find immense value in it, just as many others have before you.
